author: srimanob
body:
#### PR description:
Try to fix memory leak issue, mentionedin https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/issues/46901, for ReReco 2024 with CMSSW_14_0.

Backports of 

- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46451 
- https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46543

#### PR validation:
- CMSSW with this PR can run.

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:
-
title: [14_0_X] Backports of 46543 and 46451 to fix memory leak
